715 #define LINK_APPFS_EXEC_OPTIONS_FLASH (1<<0)
716 #define LINK_APPFS_EXEC_OPTIONS_STARTUP (1<<1) //if set executes on boot
717 #define LINK_APPFS_EXEC_OPTIONS_ROOT (1<<3) //run as root
718 #define LINK_APPFS_EXEC_OPTIONS_REPLACE (1<<4) //replace (default is to duplicate)
719 #define LINK_APPFS_EXEC_OPTIONS_ORPHAN (1<<5) //calling process wont' be parent
